mapper.insert: insert into myboard(board_num, board_title, board_content, id, nickname, profile_img) values(boardseq.nextval,#{board_title},#{board_content},#{id},#{nickname},#{profile_img})
mapper.update: update myboard set board_cnt=board_cnt+1 where board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.select: select * from myboard order by board_recommend
